Package com.example.seqr.controllers

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.example.seqr.controllers.ProfileController
public class ProfileController extends Object
Controller class for managing Profile data in database.

      onCompleteListener - Listener to be invoked when the data retrieval is complete.

    • updateGeoLocation

      public void updateGeoLocation(String uuid, boolean enableGeoLocation)
      Updates geolocation setting for a profile (device).
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the profile (device).
      enableGeoLocation - Boolean value indicating whether geolocation tracking is enabled.

    • updateProfile

      public void updateProfile(String uuid, String username, String phonenumber, String email, String homepage)
      Updates profile information in database.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the profile (device).
      username - The updated username.
      phonenumber - The updated phone number.
      email - The updated email.
      homepage - The updated homepage.

    • updatePFP

      public void updatePFP(String uuid, String ImageURL, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Void> onSuccessListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener onFailureListener)
      Updates profile picture URL in database.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the profile (device).
      ImageURL - The updated profile picture URL.
      onSuccessListener - Listener to be invoked when the operation is successful.
      onFailureListener - Listener to be invoked when the operation fails.
